title: Kensa Splattershot Pro
paragraphs: The Kensa Splattershot Pro is a main weapon in Splatoon 2. It is a Toni Kensa-branded variant of the Splattershot Pro.

The Kensa Splattershot Pro shares its overall design with the Splattershot Pro. However, the pyramid and nozzle tip are white, and the tube, trigger piece, nozzle, handhold, and the piece next to the pyramid are black. On the tube is some white text written in Inkling, and attached to the same tube is Toni Kensa's signature red clothespin.
The Kensa Splattershot Pro was released on 3 October 2018 at 02:00 UTC. It comes with Splat Bombs and the Booyah Bomb.
- An Inkling boy (first right) with the Kensa Splattershot Pro
